entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Grid contents and layout are messed up by Picker changes #16354
  • Implement support for custom page transition animation not Shell for Android #16353
  • [iOS] When using a ScrollView with Shell the ContentSize isn't sizing consistently with Forms #16352
  • SwipeView breaks binding #16345
  • Multi line editor height issue in .NET MAUI Editor control #16341
  • Grid with a star and an empty auto column leads to an incorrect layout #16334
  • "selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects." #16333

Closed

  • BlazorWebView&WebView Unable to load on the windows11 system, the program crashes directly #16161
  • FlyoutIcon does not work on Windows, although it works on Android #7577
    .NET 8 GA
  • "LoadFromXaml" inherited from a component does not find the converters used in a ControlTemplate located in another assembly. #16337
  • Bind a decimal value to Entry without StringFormat alters my binded value. #10840
    Backlog
  • Layout failure - children overflowing their bounding boxes in 7.0.86 #15195
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppRecipesSearch_Searchbymealtypesection_Orientation: At landscape orientation "Click here to view full recipe" and "Add to my recipes" controls are not visible. #15229
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_ScreenReader: Talkback is not announcing "Recipe Name" field as required field and not marked up with any chevron/symbol. #15625
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_NonTextContrast: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15626
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_Screen Reader: Talkback focus is not moving correctly when we try to edit in "Ingredients" and "Recipe". #15226
    .NET 8 GA
  • Custom webviewhandler keeps getting event of DisconnectHandler in a continuous loop #16198

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/update templates for blazor #16355
  • [appium] Bump appium version #16351
    area/upstream, dependencies
  • [uitests] Don't continue pipeline if appium install fails #16350
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Entry #16349
    memory-leak 💦
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Editor #16348
    memory-leak 💦
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    memory-leak 💦
  • [net8.0] Bump maui stable version #16342
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 8.0-preview7
  • Wrong scroll with shell and entry and safe area #16339
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1823.32 to 1.0.1901.177 #16338
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures

Merged

  • [provisioning] Make sure to provision mono for nuget #16347
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Fix Catalyst and Windows device tests #16343
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix issue with ListView not firing SelectedItemChanged #16275
  • [vs-workload][net8.0] Set EnableSideBySideManifests=true #16131
    area/setup 🪄, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview
  • [iOS] Add updates for LineHeight, TextDecorations, CharacterSpacing #16223
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Add ViewHandler Mapper docs #16296
    area/docs 📓
  • [net8.0] Bump Microsoft.Extensions packages #16257
    area/upstream, dependencies, 8.0-preview7
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓
  • [Windows] Fix SwipeView DeviceTests #16226
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-swipeview
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    memory-leak 💦
  • Adds prompts when creating a new page. #16331
    community ✨, backport/suggested
  • [macios] test macios bump of illink and sdk #16329
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Use correct clip path method for RoundRectangle #16132
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
